casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Sakon PARKER No. 396P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Michael E. Casterline, Attorney at Law, William Sakon Parker, for Parker, William Sakon. Marie Hartwell Evitt, Attorney at Law, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of November 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: "Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019." Morgan, J. recused
